name: One Night 4 Dances
description:
One Night 4 Dances

Milonga

Originally from American Spanish.

Refers to a lively dance, the music it is danced to, and the place, or event where it is danced (alongside tango).

Formerly, in Brazilian Portugese, it referred to "angry, or repetitive words, witchcraft"



Dance, blood, merriment! Em and Andy visit a milonga in Buda castle - it is Em's very first - and find a little more than just music.

A short visual novel in Ren'Py, my very first attempt at using the engine. Hope you enjoy, Abrazos

CW: Strong language, manipulation, implied violence.
